column4: I have a Realtek RTL8139 Ethernet controller. Network Setting detects a wired connection and appears to be connected, but I can't get online or ping my router or a website.
Darwin I had the same problem lol. You have to shut off your modem and router for 30seconds to get a new IP for your comp.
I have the same setup. The way I got it working was shutting down the comp, unplugging the modem and router and letting them power cycle.
